text: "Painkiller" is a 1990 song by British heavy metal band Judas Priest and is the title track to their 12th studio album Painkiller. It went to number 74 in the United Kingdom and was nominated for a Grammy Award in 1991. It was covered by death metal band Death. == References == Category:1990 songs Category:Judas Priest songs Category:Heavy metal
title: Painkiller (Judas Priest song)
